sources.title: The Invisible Wall
sources.description: Title: The Invisible Wall Summary: When a mob boss sends gambler Harry Lane to Vegas to deliver 20K to a contact, Harry gambles the money away and must somehow recover it before getting into trouble with his employer. Directed by: Eugene Forde Actors: Don Castle, Virginia Christine, Richard Gaines Production Company: Sol M. Wurtzel Productions Release Date: 15 October 1947 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A former GI returning from the war gets back his old job working for a bookie. Dispatched by the bookie to deliver $20,000 to a contact in Las Vegas, he foolishly loses some of the money at the gambling tables, then loses the rest of it to a conman. His attempts to recover the money result in his getting involved in mistaken identity and murder.

metadata.Plot: A former GI returning from the war gets back his old job working for a bookie. Dispatched by the bookie to deliver $20,000 to a contact in Las Vegas, he foolishly loses some of the money at the gambling tables, then loses the rest of it to a conman. His attempts to recover the money result in his getting involved in mistaken identity and murder.
metadata.Writer: Arnold Belgard, Howard J. Green, Paul Frank
metadata.Actors: Don Castle, Virginia Christine, Richard Gaines
